author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:

Cleanup of test configurations for obsolete field maps that are no longer supported since a long time. 
Made all .pys refer to the proper StandardSequences. 
No functional changes expected.
Note: some of the modified test .pys are quite obviously obsolete (eg those in DPGAnalysis/Skims seems to have been last updated at the time of CRAFT): please note the goal here is not to fix/update them, just to eradicate every reference in CMSSW to maps declared obsolete so that they are not used as an example elsewhere.
Also, some cleanup of tests configurations under MagneticField, and revert  one xml file that was erroneusly removed in an earlier cleanup (useful only for reference).

#### PR validation:

Checked the formal correctness of each modified .py (a good fraction of the modified .py files seems to be obsolete and does not run out of the box).
Checked functionality of modified .py files under MagneticField.
title: Cleanup old and obsolete configurations related to MF
